bridges

Class Bridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • bridges.Bridge

  • public class Bridge
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection to the Bridges server. Initialize this class before using it, and call complete() afterward.

        public static void init(int assignment,
        java.lang.String key,
        Visualizer visualizer,
        BridgeNetwork backend)
        Initialize Bridges with a Visualizer and a backend. This is only intended to make debugging easier by allowing you to stub the Internet.
        Parameters:
        assignment - Your assignment ID
        visualizer -
        backend -

      • update

        public static void update()
        Update visualization metadata. This may be called many times. This is usually an expensive operation and involves connecting to the network. Calling this method is optional provided you call complete()

      • complete

        public static void complete()
        Close down Bridges. This only calls update() but it could conceivably do more.

      • trimComma

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder trimComma(java.lang.StringBuilder in)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
